The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all throughout the place and into the crew members themselves. It's learned that the desert itself can come to life to feed on people and the crew is going to be next.
